title: get_system_health_status
description: Test the /api/health GET endpoint to verify it returns the system health status including database connectivity, uptime, version, and environment. Validate response codes 200 for healthy system and 503 for unhealthy system.

title: get_all_products_with_pagination_and_filtering
description: Test the /api/products GET endpoint to retrieve products with various query parameters like main_category, category, active, include_inactive, page, and limit. Validate pagination info and filtering correctness.

title: create_new_product_with_required_fields
description: Test the /api/products POST endpoint to create a new product with required fields such as name, base_price, main_category, and category. Validate success response 201 and error responses for validation and server errors.

title: get_single_product_by_id
description: Test the /api/products/{id} GET endpoint to fetch product details by UUID. Validate 200 response with product details and 404 when product is not found.

title: update_product_details
description: Test the /api/products/{id} PATCH endpoint to update product information including name, slug, description, base_price, main_category, category, active status, and variants. Validate 200 success and 500 server error responses.

title: delete_product_by_id
description: Test the /api/products/{id} DELETE endpoint to delete a product by UUID. Validate 200 success and 500 server error responses.

title: get_orders_by_phone_email_or_order_number
description: Test the /api/orders GET endpoint to retrieve orders filtered by phone, email, or order number. Validate 200 success with orders found and 400 error for missing required parameters.

title: create_new_order_with_inventory_validation
description: Test the /api/orders POST endpoint to create a new order with customer details, shipping address, items, and payment method. Validate stock availability, order creation success 201, and error responses for validation and server errors.

title: update_order_status_by_id
description: Test the /api/orders/{id}/status PATCH endpoint to update the status of an order. Validate allowed status values, 200 success, 400 invalid status, and 500 server error responses.

title: get_active_offers
description: Test the /api/offers GET endpoint to retrieve the list of active promotional offers. Validate 200 success response with offers data.
